hero__description.en: My name is Bekzod, I am 13 years old. I‚Äôm passionate about programming and currently work with Node.js (Express), PostgreSQL, and React PWA. about__description2.en: Our goal is to interest young people in the IT field, give them practical knowledge and turn them into successful programmers or IT specialists in the future. We pay attention to each student individually to strengthen their knowledge.
